title: [FSX][FSX SE][P3D] Just Flight Fokker Friendship F-27
description:
Cracked Version of recently released Just Flight Fokker F-27 for FSX.

I did not crack it, it was some french dude, I'm just uploading it.

Very awesome plane, very well detailed VC, everything working just perfectly.

Install Instructions:

1 - Run "Install_Friendship.exe"
2 - Select language, don't click next.
3 - Run "Just Flight Activation Patcher.exe"
4 - Run the Patcher, click find target, it will patch, than close it.
5 - Proceed with installation, when activation windows pops-up, put whatever you want on the fields
6 - It will say it is wrong, don't worry, that's normal, close the activation window, it will close the installer too
7 - Run the installer again, and install normally, the activation window won't appear.

This addon has been in the works for a very long time by Just Flight, support the developers, if you liked it, buy it!

Sorry in advance for any grammar errors, english is not my native language
